controller.client

Class ClientCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.client.ClientCommands

  • public class ClientCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    ClientCommands class. Contains some static commands that can be executed on the client. Are usually called from the CommandInterpreter. Most methods here require the parent to be passed because one instance of the game might have multiple client instances running (AIs vs player in singleplayer mode)
    Author:
    Bit 4 - Group 4

    • Method Detail

      • setTiles

        public static void setTiles(java.lang.String[] args,
                            Client clientObject)
        Method some time after client receives the "tiles" command from the server Saves the parent client's current tiles in the Client "clientTiles" field.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments sent with the "tiles" command
        clientObject - Parent client object.

      • makeBoard

        public static void makeBoard(Client clientObject)
        Sets the client's board to a new, empty board
        Parameters:
        clientObject - client to do this for

      • otherTiles

        public static void otherTiles(java.lang.String[] args,
                              Client clientObject)
        Method some time after client receives the "tiles" command from the server Sets opponents' current tiles in the Client "otherTiles" field. Prints them in the shortened format specified in protocol, e.g. WWW1 or RRR6.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments sent with the "tiles" command
        clientObject - Parent client object.

      • bestMove

        public static java.lang.String bestMove(TileBag tileBag,
                                        Client clientObject)
        Calculates best moves for a client Checks client's board. Checks for every piece: For every rotated variant of this piece: For every location on the board: the score moving it there would generate (if invalid: 0) Then returns the move (as string "place XX on YY") with highest score.
        Parameters:
        clientObject - Client to generate this move for
        tileBag - Client's tiles to generate this move for
        Returns:
        the best move possible in string representation i.e. "place RRR6 on 20"

      • aiTurn

        public static void aiTurn(Client clientObject)
        Method executes when an AI client is given the turn Usually called from TerminalInputHandler, in the AI_TURN state. Depending on the AI's difficulty, generates a random or best move.
        Parameters:
        clientObject - Client to generate this move for

      • aiSkip

        public static void aiSkip(Client clientObject)
        Method executes when an AI client is given the turn but must skip Usually called from TerminalInputHandler, in the AI_SKIP state. Generates some random numbers using which it determines to skip or exchange And then another random number to determine which tile to exchange
        Parameters:
        clientObject - Client to generate this move for
